text: For the value, the porridge is great and delicious. One of the few places to sell porridge in CCK! Perfect for breakfast or sick food. Do note the operating hours!

Overall food was delicious and nice. There's You Tiao to accompany the porridge. Fresh Ingredients were used. Overall, delicious food, but the price is not really friendly... Quite expensive for porridge but slightly too expensive. Used to be pretty cheap long ago. But it's still very hard to find porridge nearby so no complaints.

I put 3 stars because I never got chance to try. Saw reviews looks positive and good. But no time operation. Went down it was closed at 8.20PM
Assumed only operation morning to afternoon.

Upload some latest photos for community to know
Soothing porridge fora sick man. Traditional taste. Good portion. Overall gives a good feeling.

Called them to find out that their opening hours are 6 am to 2 pm.  Had takeaway for century egg lean meat porridge (皮蛋瘦肉粥) and sliced fish meat ball porridge (鱼片肉丸粥). The Cantonese porridge texture is just right with smooth cotton feel (綿綿的). Sliced fish is fresh and white, each slice with equal size. Pork meatballs are handmade. Youtiao used the right flour. It is crispy and not oily.
